problem: Poorly structured or outdated code slows down developers and increases delays.
solution: Code audit identifies redundancies, technical debt, and proposes solutions to streamline development processes.
impact: Reduced development time, better collaboration, and faster onboarding of new developers.
title: Improving team productivity

problem: Frequent bugs increase maintenance costs and can harm the company's image.
solution: The audit detects vulnerabilities, security flaws, and risk areas in the code.
impact: Decreased service interruptions, improved application stability, and reduced expenses related to fixes.
title: Reducing bugs and incidents

problem: Current code may not be optimized to support the company's future growth.
solution: The audit verifies if the code is ready to support a growing volume of users and features.
impact: Ensured scalability, preparation for traffic spikes, and addition of new features without performance impact.
title: Scalability and preparation for growth

problem: Poorly optimized code can lead to high operating costs (infrastructure, maintenance, development time).
solution: The audit identifies areas for improvement to optimize resource utilization (infrastructure, API).
impact: Reduced operating costs, optimized server resources, and smart investment in the right technologies.
title: Reducing long-term costs

problem: Teams may be limited by their knowledge of current best practices in development.
solution: In addition to the audit, specific training on improved points allows for the strengthening of internal developers' skills.
impact: More autonomous and competent team, better ability to maintain clean and evolving code, reduced dependence on external providers.
title: Team training and skill development

problem: Many companies want to modernize their stack to integrate new technologies (cloud, microservices, AI).
solution: Code audit can be the first step to understand what can be optimized for a successful migration to modern architectures like the cloud or microservices.
impact: Facilitating digital transformation, laying the groundwork for adopting innovative technological solutions without major disruption.
title: Preparing for digital transformation
